SEARCH
Package com.mycompany.main

Class PropertyField

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.main.Field
com.mycompany.main.PropertyField
public class PropertyField extends Field
The PropertyField class represents a property field on the game board. Players can buy this property, pay rent to the owner, and build houses on it.
